name: ProhostAI
headline: AI Property Manager for Airbnb & Short-Term Rental Hosts
description: ProhostAI is building an AI Property Manager for short-term rental hosts on Airbnb and other platforms. Our team consists of an ex-Airbnb Staff Data Scientist and Dropbox Sr Software Engineer who are also Superhosts with 9 properties worth $15M making $1.5M/yr.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:travel; industry:ai-assistant; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Bill Ulammandakh, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at ProhostAI. Previously Staff Data Scientist at Airbnb, Etsy, Thumbtack and Wayfair. Harvard undergrad.

founders.name: Andrew Lawson, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO at ProhostAI. Previously Software Engineer at Dropbox, JWPlayer, and others.

Backed by
[![Y Combinator logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66b014e1f2c9dd4b8dcdfe74_yc-3257e7aa3335f053290a90a94d330a67-1100x200.png)](https://www.prohost.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/prohostai>)[![Pear VC logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66b01edfb624839133b40364_Pear-Logo_wide.png)](https://www.prohost.ai/<https:/pear.vc/>)
Team from
![Airbnb logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66b0165dfb9db66b343d3ad0_Airbnb_Logo_Be%CC%81lo.svg.png)![Dropbox logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66b01673d9a9003eed8785f7_Dropbox-logo-768x432.png)![Harvard logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66b01688a9ad7f7bf90f7605_Harvard_University_logo.svg.png)![Superhosts logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66b029f20c5debd30ecfb59b_superhost_logo.png)
![Image 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66cea22e0d908d9660cd219b_viewing%20tooltip.png)![Image 1 Mobile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66ceacbff2c72c06fb3efa25_mockuuups-fsRTGWy62vfGY5vRkMG9Tr%20\(1\).png)

![Oasis image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7badc_feature-img-2.jpg)
![Oasis image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb14_hero-img-2.jpg)
![Oasis image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb10_hero-img-3.jpg)

![Oasis image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb10_hero-img-3.jpg)
![Oasis image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb11_hero-img-4.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7baf4_mail.svg)
AI response for every guest message
Easily respond to guest messages with AI across all channels, including Airbnb, VRBO. Pre-drafted AI responses will 10X your productivity and cut down your response times.
[Learn More](https://www.prohost.ai/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb9a_icon-1.svg)
AI Maintenance Ticketing
[Learn More](https://www.prohost.ai/<#>)
Automatically detect & create maintenance tickets with AI from guest messages and reviews so that you can focus on guest experience instead of manually creating tickets.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb96_icon.svg)
Collaborate with your Team
See when your team members are online, viewing or typing. Push notifications and mobile apps alert you about new messages right away.
[Learn More](https://www.prohost.ai/<#>)
![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66ceb25c10191ccad00786c0_iphone_mockup_1.png)
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7baf5_pricing-icon.svg)
AI Response for every guest message
Respond to guests with pre-drafted, high quality messages from wherever you are with our native mobile app available on iOS and Android.
![Image 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/66ceb1366a2e8955781d6055_iphone_mockup_2.png)
![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7baf5_pricing-icon.svg)
Stay on top of maintenance tasks with AI
Stay on top of all guest feedback with AI with automated maintenance ticketing from guest messages and reviews.
[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)AnalyticsGain insights into your property management operations and performance to optimize your business and generate more revenueFeatures![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)![Oasis image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb15_card-bg.jpg)](https://www.prohost.ai/<#>)[![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)IntegrationsSeamlessly connect ProhostAI with your preferred tools and services for maximum efficiency.Get Help![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)![Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bad1_blob-arrow.svg)![Oasis image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6592ba58e7771a666be7ba2f/6592ba58e7771a666be7bb16_card-bg-1.jpg)](https://www.prohost.ai/<#>)

generated_description:
**ProhostAI: Redefining Property Management for Short-Term Rentals**

ProhostAI is an innovative venture founded in 2024, aiming to revolutionize how Airbnb and short-term rental hosts manage their properties. Based in San Francisco and a proud participant in Y Combinator Batch S24, ProhostAI is not just another tech startup. It packs a punch with a co-founding team that includes an ex-Airbnb data scientist and a senior software engineer from Dropbox, both of whom are experienced Superhosts managing a portfolio worth $15 million that generates $1.5 million in annual revenue.

### Mission
The mission of ProhostAI is straightforward yet ambitious: to create an AI-powered property management assistant tailored specifically for rental hosts. This assistant utilizes advanced technology to streamline communication, automate maintenance management, and optimize guest interactions—all while enhancing the host's productivity.

### Why It Matters
Managing rental properties is a hectic job filled with countless messages, maintenance requests, and guest inquiries. ProhostAI is here to alleviate that stress. The service offers tools to automatically respond to guest messages, generate maintenance tickets from feedback, and provide analytics on property performance, thus freeing up valuable time for hosts.

### Team & Backing
With a small but mighty team of five, ProhostAI is advised by industry veterans, including Garry Tan as a group partner. Their expertise is backed by funding from reputable sources like Y Combinator and Pear VC, both of which lend credibility to the startup’s potential.

### Key Features
1. **AI-Powered Guest Messaging:** Pre-drafted responses to guest messages ensure hosts can respond quickly and efficiently, no matter which platform they are using—Airbnb, VRBO, or more.
2. **Automated Maintenance Ticketing:** This feature automatically creates tickets from guest feedback, enabling hosts to prioritize the guest experience rather than get bogged down in logistics.
3. **Team Collaboration Tools:** Hosts can see when their team members are online and engaged, promoting real-time collaboration and communication.
4. **Analytical Insights:** ProhostAI provides valuable analytics to help hosts optimize operations and boost revenue. 

### The Future
In a world where short-term rentals are rapidly becoming a preferred accommodation model, ProhostAI is poised to become a must-have tool for anyone serious about maximizing their property’s potential. Whether you are a seasoned Superhost or just starting in the rental game, ProhostAI offers a suite of tools that promise to streamline your operations and take the headache out of property management.

For more information, or to get started with a free trial, check out their website at [ProhostAI](https://www.prohost.ai/).

In conclusion, ProhostAI is not just another AI tool; it's an essential partner for modern rental hosts looking to thrive in a competitive market. With its powerful features and strong team backing, it’s set to redefine the landscape of property management for short-term rentals.
